message.content:
Based on the provided information, here is a detailed breakdown of the form in JSON format. Note that there are no checkboxes visible in the provided image, so all data included are extracted from the text.

```json
{
  "document": {
    "title": "PROFESSIONAL SERVICES CONTRACT",
    "contract_number": "000000000000000000000046016",
    "parties": {
      "state": "Indiana School for the Deaf",
      "contractor": "Carly Buchwald"
    },
    "terms": {
      "duties_of_contractor": {
        "A": "Perform routine medical care for the students including the following: Diagnoses and treatments at the school for all illnesses and injuries which will permit the student to remain at school and in class.",
        "details": [
          "Hold clinics to see students who have been referred to the Health Center by staff or whose parents have requested that they be seen by the family nurse practitioner.",
          "Perform diagnoses when appropriate of student injuries to determine if referral to a specialist is indicated.",
          "Perform physical examinations to certify students for disability status and for participation in school athletic programs, special programs, and summer and/or special camps.",
          "Monitor hospital and emergency room treatment of students, determining if additional treatment and/or follow-up care is required."
        ]
      },
      "B": "Coordinate Medical Services including:",
      "coordinate_medical_services": [
        "Review medical records and monitor the progress of students who are under treatment, and chronic care by physicians, consulting with the studentâ€™s personal physician when appropriate.",
        "Monitor screening programs such as: Vision, and immunization to determine if treatment and follow-up of medical problems.",
        "Attend staff meetings when necessary, to provide information/education/background on student medical concerns.",
        "Ensure that all necessary medical and treatment records are properly maintained and are current.",
        "Consultation with specialists, including Audiologists and Vision Specialists, to ensure proper treatment and follow-up of medical problems."
      ],
      "C": "Perform medical evaluations of new students:",
      "perform_medical_evaluations": [
        "Review medical records to assess needs and make recommendations to the staff.",
        "Interview parents to develop the students and/or family medical history."
      ],
      "D": "Consult with staff and parents in student health concerns."
    }
  }
}
```

In this JSON structure:
- General document details are encapsulated within the "document" field.
- The contract's reference number is specified under "contract_number".
- The involved parties (state agency and contractor) are listed under "parties".
- The terms and duties are detailed primarily under "duties_of_contractor", "coordinate_medical_services", "perform_medical_evaluations", and consultations.

Feel free to adjust this structure or add more information based on additional data from other parts of the document.
